title: Rate of inflation in Belgium 2018 to 2020
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Year on year percentage change for 25 number of Months.
The Year on year percentage change is appeared to be the highest at Month Nov '18 and lowest at Month Nov '19.
The difference of Year on year percentage change between the highest and lowest Month is 2.39.
